explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of machine learning models in the context of tax risk identification, indicating a reliance on machine learning techniques.
explanations.representation learning: The proposed method, NEUD-TRI, involves network embedding which is a form of representation learning, aiming to capture both local and global network structures.
explanations.feature representation: The method focuses on capturing network structures (both static and dynamic) which inherently involves learning feature representations of the network nodes (taxpayers).
